reviewText: I just moved back from England and used to watch this show all the time.  It is very similar to the show here in the US called Shark Tank.  I learned so much about business from watching this.  If you're looking for a business loan or even a way to get new partners for music business, this is a great way to learn how to do it.  It's also a lot of fun to see all the great inventions and businesses that are featured.
